recipe_name: Fresh Fig and Prosciutto Pasta Sauce
ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup milk, 6 thin slices  prosciutto, cut into thin strips, 6  fresh figs, stemmed and quartered, 1 tablespoon lemon zest,   +   1/4 teaspoon lemon pepper seasoning, or to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 6g 29%, Cholesterol 30mg 10%, Sodium 592mg 26%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 7%, Dietary Fiber 2g 9%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 4mg 18%, Calcium 102mg 8%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 274mg 6%
